property.title: Villa Les Oliviers
property.description:
Exceptional contemporary villa nestled in the heart of a private 2-hectare estate, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Mediterranean. This exceptional property combines architectural elegance and cutting-edge technology in a preserved green setting.

Designed by renowned architect Jean-Michel Durand, this 250 mÂ² villa unfolds its refined volumes around a landscaped central patio. Noble materials - Burgundy stone, solid oak, aged brass - dialogue with large bay windows that open the space onto the landscaped garden and infinity pool.

86379445.title: Cosy Riad
86379445.description:
EXCLUSIVE - MEDINA - RIAD TITLE FOR SALE

Located in the heart of the medina, this charming riad of approximately 25 mÂ² of floor space is spread over 3 floors plus a terrace with a pleasant open view.
The property includes 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a perfect terrace to relax.
This riad is currently operated as a seasonal rental on Airbnb, making it a turnkey investment opportunity.
Its privileged location in the medina, close to amenities, makes it an ideal property for tourist rental or as a personal pied-Ã -terre.
A riad ready to generate immediate income.

If you are interested in this property, please do not hesitate to contact us
Agency fee 2.5% excl. VAT

86380226.title: Dia House
86380226.description:
ESSAOUIRA - RARE PROPERTY TITLE - OCEAN VIEW
Located close to Essaouira, in the second row facing the ocean, this 115 mÂ² single-storey house offers a privileged location in one of the most sought-after villages on the outskirts of Essaouira.
The property, in need of complete renovation, allows for the construction of two additional levels, eventually offering unobstructed ocean views.
An ideal project for: a real estate investment, a quiet main residence, or the creation of a tourist property with character.
As opportunities in this sector are very rare, this property represents a real opportunity not to be missed for lovers of Essaouira and its authenticity.

If you are interested in this property, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Agency fee 2.5% excl. VAT

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Welcome to Square Meter. By using our platform, you accept these terms of service which govern our premium services.
terms.confidentialityDescription: Square Meter is committed to strict confidentiality regarding:
terms.companyResponsibilitiesText: Square Meter implements all reasonable means to ensure the accuracy of published information. However, the User acknowledges that this information may contain inaccuracies. Square Meter cannot be held responsible for indirect damages resulting from the use of the site.
terms.userResponsibilitiesText: The User undertakes to provide accurate and complete information during registration and to keep it up to date. They also undertake to use the services in a legal, ethical manner and in accordance with these Terms of Service.
terms.questionsDescription: Our legal team is available to answer all your questions regarding our terms of service.

services.service1: Consultation of prestigious real estate properties

article1.title: Purpose
article1.description: These terms of service (ToS) aim to provide the legal framework for the provision of Square Meter's services and their use by the User.

article2.title: Services Offered
article2.description: Square Meter offers premium services to support your prestigious real estate projects, including consultation, valuation, and management of exceptional properties.

article3.title: Commitment to Discretion
article3.description: Square Meter is committed to strict confidentiality regarding your information, the properties presented, and all ongoing transactions.

article4.title: Responsibilities
article4.description: Square Meter implements all reasonable means to ensure the accuracy of published information. The User undertakes to provide accurate information and to use the services in compliance.

article5.title: Intellectual Property
article5.description: All elements of the Square Meter site (texts, images, photographs, logos) are protected by copyright. Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

article6.title: Personal Data
article6.description: The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is an integral part of these ToS. We are committed to protecting your data in accordance with GDPR and applicable laws.

article7.title: Limitations of Liability
article7.description: Square Meter's liability cannot be engaged in the event of force majeure or unforeseeable and irresistible acts of a third party. Square Meter does not guarantee permanent site availability and reserves the right to interrupt the service for maintenance.

article8.title: Modifications to the ToS
article8.description: Square Meter reserves the right to modify these ToS at any time. Users will be informed of significant changes by email or via the platform. Continued use of the service after notification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

article9.title: Applicable Law
article9.description: These ToS are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute, the courts of Paris shall have sole jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At Square Meter, the protection of your personal data is our absolute priority. Discover how we guarantee the confidentiality and security of your information.
privacy.dataRetentionDescription: We retain your information for the period strictly necessary to achieve the purposes for which it is collected.
privacy.yourRightsDescription: In accordance with GDPR, you have extensive rights over your personal data
privacy.exerciseRightsDescription: For any questions or requests concerning your personal data, contact our Data Protection Officer
privacy.responseTime: We are committed to responding to any request within a maximum of 30 days

principle1.title: Maximum Protection
principle1.description: Your data is protected by banking-level security systems with end-to-end encryption.

principle2.title: Absolute Confidentiality
principle2.description: We never share your information with third parties without your explicit consent.

principle3.title: GDPR Compliance
principle3.description: We strictly comply with all European data protection regulations.

principle4.title: Total Transparency
principle4.description: You have complete control over your data and can consult or delete it at any time.

dataUsage.usage1: Offer you properties that perfectly match your criteria
dataUsage.usage2: Personalize your experience on our premium platform
dataUsage.usage3: Continuously improve our services and your satisfaction
dataUsage.usage4: Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations

dataRetention.item1: Contact data: duration of the business relationship
dataRetention.item3: Legal documents: in accordance with legal obligations

right1.title: Right of Access
right1.description: Consult all your personal data at any time

right2.title: Right of Rectification
right2.description: Correct your inaccurate or incomplete information

right3.title: Right to Erasure
right3.description: Request the deletion of your personal data

right4.title: Right to Restriction
right4.description: Limit the processing of your information

right5.title: Right to Portability
right5.description: Retrieve your data in a structured format

right6.title: Right to Object
right6.description: Object to the processing of your data
